statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboards
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM leaderboards
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM leaderboards GROUP BY player_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_name ASC, score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE score >= 100 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name <> 'Bob' AND score BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM leaderboard JOIN player_stats ON leaderboard.player_id = player_stats.player_id
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_score AS combined_score FROM player_stats JOIN leaderboard ON player_stats.player_id = leaderboard.player_id
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM leaderboard l JOIN player_stats ps ON l.player_id = ps.player_id;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM leaderboard l JOIN player_stats ps ON l.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_score FROM leaderboard l JOIN player_stats ps ON l.player_id = ps.player_id WHERE total_score > 500 AND games_played < 20 ORDER BY games_played ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' AND score BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM player ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, game_id FROM game WHERE game_name LIKE 'Mario%';
SELECT leaderboard_id, player_id, game_id, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC, score DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT game_name, player_name, score FROM game JOIN leaderboard ON game.game_id = leaderboard.game_id JOIN player ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY game_name DESC, player_name ASC, score DESC

SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_games_played FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_games_played > 5 ORDER BY total_games_played DESC

SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id JOIN game ON game.game_id = leaderboard.game_id WHERE game_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY game_name ASC, player_name DESC, score ASC
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM leaderboard
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players;
SELECT * FROM Leaderboards;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT P.player_name, PS.score FROM Players P JOIN PlayerScores PS ON P.player_id = PS.player_id WHERE PS.score > 500 ORDER BY PS.score DESC;
SELECT L.leaderboard_name, R.rank FROM Leaderboards L JOIN Rankings R ON L.leaderboard_id = R.leaderboard_id WHERE R.rank <= 3 ORDER BY R.rank ASC;
SELECT MAX(player_score) AS highest_score FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM Players P JOIN Rankings R ON P.player_id = R.player_id WHERE R.rank = 1 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players JOIN player_game_scores ON players.player_id = player_game_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_game_scores.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, overall_rank, game_rank FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT player_name, games.game_name, player_game_scores.score FROM players JOIN player_game_scores ON players.player_id = player_game_scores.player_id JOIN games ON player_game_scores.game_id = games.game_id
SELECT player_name, overall_rank, game_rank FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id
SELECT player_name, player_scores.score FROM players LEFT JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id AND player_scores.score > 50 ORDER BY player_scores.score DESC
